data.title: Two Oando Subsidiaries receive ISO 9001:2008 Certification – Oando PLC
data.meta_description: Oando PLC is one of Africa’s largest integrated energy solutions provider with a proud heritage. It has a primary listing on the Nigeria Stock Exchange and a secondary listing on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange.
data.text:
Two Oando Subsidiaries receive ISO 9001:2008 Certification

Oando PLC, Nigeria’s leading energy conglomerate is pleased to announce that two more of its subsidiaries, Oando Supply & Trading and Oando Exploration & Production have received the ISO 9001:2008 certification for quality management systems from the Standards Organisation of Nigeria (SON), representative of International Organisation for Standardization in Nigeria.

The award which is subsequent to a series of rigorous and extensive audit of the companies’ facilities and processes, brings to four the number of Oando subsidiaries with ISO Certification. Prior, Oando Marketing PLC and Oando Gas and Power have received the ISO 9001:2000 which has now been upgraded to the latest ISO 9001:2008 certification.

ISO 9001:2008 is global standard mechanism designed to improve business processes with the objective of deepening workplace safety, service delivery and product quality for customers. The tool is a mix of methodologies and principles used in evaluating the effectiveness and efficiency of a quality management system.

Speaking at the award formal presentation of the certificates on June 7, 2011 at the Victoria Crown Plaza Hotel, Victoria Island, Lagos, the Director General, Standards Organization of Nigeria, Dr Joseph I. Odumodu congratulated the two companies saying “I join other Nigerians to congratulate you on this milestone achievement. By this achievement, these companies have joined the lofty class of Quality Management Systems certified companies in Nigeria. This is a giant stride in the pursuit of excellence to provide quality services in the oil & gas industry. This is worthy of emulation by well meaning business community”.

Commenting, Chief Environment, Health, Safety, Security and Quality Officer, Oando PLC, Dr Chris Onuoha stated that “The ISO 9001:2008 certification offers us a unique matrix to audit and measure the effectiveness of our processes; enhance our productivity and assure our customers of a strong service delivery culture. We will continue to subject our operations to the highest international scrutiny as a major driver of service excellence”

Also Commenting, Mr. Dimeji Edwards, MD/CEO, Oando Supply & Trading Limited, said “This achievement demonstrates our commitment to high level of service delivery to our geographically diverse customers. Our vision of sustained customer excellence will remain at the centerpiece of our operations”.

According to MD/CEO, Oando Exploration and Production Limited, Mr. Pade Durotoye, “We are pleased to have achieved this certification which attests to the robustness and quality of our processes. We are resolute about continuous refinement of our quality and safety assurance systems to further endear us to multinational corporate seeking world class partnership”

End

About Oando PLC

With vast footprint in the energy value chain, which includes businesses in petroleum products, marketing, supplies and trading, natural gas distribution, power generation, rig service provision and crude oil exploration & production, Oando has evolved policies and procedures to ensure the safest and most environment-friendly operations in the oil and gas industry.

Oando Supply & Trading (OS&T), Nigeria’s largest independent and privately owned trading company has over the years developed a reputation for providing high quality and reliable services to its customers. Its exceptional delivery record and operational performance has resulted in the development of an extensive, safe and environment-friendly network globally.

Oando Exploration and Production (OEPL) is a leading indigenous upstream oil & gas company in Nigeria with vast portfolio of oil and gas assets in selected African basins and acts as both operator and partner to Nigeria and Multinational companies. OEPL today prides itself as the first indigenous E & P Company to secure the ISO 9001:2008 certification, a feat that reinforces its quest to provide the world-class upstream operator in the sub-Saharan Africa’s oil and gas industry.
